<p class="MsoNoteLevel1CxSpFirst" style="margin-left:0cm;mso-add-space:auto;
text-indent:0cm;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><a href="http://www.cppblog.com/huaxiazhihuo/archive/2012/05/30/176792.html"><span style="font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Lantinghei SC Extralight";color:#2E9CE9;text-decoration:none;text-underline:
none">试论</span><span style="color:#2E9CE9;text-decoration:none;text-underline:
none">C++</span><span style="font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight",sans-serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight";color:#2E9CE9;text-decoration:
none;text-underline:none">类库开发之难</span></a><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class="MsoNoteLevel1CxSpMiddle" style="margin-left:0cm;mso-add-space:auto;
text-indent:0cm;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:black;background:white;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">         </span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight",sans-serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight";color:black;background:white;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">很久很久以前，<span style="background:yellow;mso-highlight:yellow">世界上曾经存在着这么一种语言，用它写出来的代码，既能保证高效的运行效率，又兼具优雅十足的美感，并且，所有语言存在着的不足，都可以通过添加新的自定义的类型来实现出来，并且，新的类型，只要做得好，可以与原有的类型无缝交互。在它的世界里面，那是一切皆有可能。</span></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight",sans-serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight";color:red;background:white;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">并且，它还承诺，虽然它的功能非常丰富，但各个功能特性都可以和睦相处，而且，你代码中不必要用到某项功能时，你完全不必为这项功能付出那怕一丁点的代价</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight",sans-serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight";color:black;background:white;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">，如果这个语言愿意作一点点妥协，可能它就不是现在的这个样子，至少将更加容易使用。所有它承诺的一切，乍听起来美妙无比，而且，它也似乎做到了，真的做到了马儿既能跑，又能吃尽量少的草，前提是开发人员要小心翼翼地用好这门语言的一切特性。只可惜事与愿违，这门语言确实看起来，真的可以创造出完美的东西，但事实上，没有人能用它写出过一个好东西，那怕是简简单单的字符串，要做得大多数人拍手叫好，也是千难万难，完美的字符串，从来就没有出现过。各位同学，自然知道在下说的是什么语言，等千呼万唤的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:black;
background:white;mso-font-kerning:0pt">C++1X</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight",sans-serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight";color:black;background:white;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">始出来之后，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:black;background:white;mso-font-kerning:
0pt"> </span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight",sans-serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight";color:black;background:white;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">真不知道还有什么东西，是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:black;background:white;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">C++</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight",sans-serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight";color:black;background:white;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">没法做的，要在</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:black;background:white;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">C++</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight",sans-serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight";color:black;background:white;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">中增加几种新的编程模式，也不会有太多的困难。起码，函数式的编程，使函数好像成为一等公民，绝不是什么难事。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:black;
mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br clear="all">
<span style="background:white">        
 C++</span></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:
"Lantinghei SC Extralight",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight";mso-bidi-font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight";
color:black;background:white;mso-font-kerning:0pt">本身自然不会有什么问题，说它复杂吧，它确实复杂，但是完全可以无视，异常不好，禁用就是；多继承很坏，不用就是；模板过于复杂，忘了它吧；</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:black;
background:white;mso-font-kerning:0pt">……</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight",sans-serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight";color:black;background:white;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">，起码它做到了，你不喜欢的特性，你可以不必付出任何代价。但是，成千上万的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:black;
background:white;mso-font-kerning:0pt">C++</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight",sans-serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight";color:black;background:white;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">高手大牛巨侠，这么多年下来，却没有搞出几个似模似样的类库出来，除了</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:

mso-bidi-font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight";color:#FF6600;background:white;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">没有必要的类库来支持，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#FF6600;background:white;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">C++</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight";mso-bidi-font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight";
color:#FF6600;background:white;mso-font-kerning:0pt">做开发，工作量相当浩大，并且还容易生产出一堆不成熟的通用类；</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight",sans-serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight";color:black;background:white;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">但是，必要的成熟的类库，市面上又没有多少个，目前的所谓的高级的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:black;
background:white;mso-font-kerning:0pt">C++</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight",sans-serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight";color:black;background:white;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">类库，大多数都在为了</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:black;background:white;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">C++</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight",sans-serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight";color:black;background:white;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">而</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:black;background:white;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">C++</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight",sans-serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight";color:black;background:white;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">，你们知道我在说的是那一个的。当然，俺是没能力写出什么类库的，所谓的眼高手低，大概就是这样吧。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:black;
mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br clear="all">
<span style="background:white"> </span></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight",sans-serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight";color:black;background:white;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">或者，痛并快乐着，是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:black;background:white;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">C++</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight",sans-serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight";color:black;background:white;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">码迷的持久不退的热情所在。只是，人生何其宝贵，将它们浪费在</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:black;
background:white;mso-font-kerning:0pt">C++</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight",sans-serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight";color:black;background:white;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">上，实在有点不值得。当然，活着只要快乐就好，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:black;
background:white;mso-font-kerning:0pt">C++</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight",sans-serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Lantinghei SC Extralight";color:black;background:white;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">也确实能给人带来很多快乐。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"Times",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>
